main event: Pilots at Mather AFB reported sighting four bright flaming objects during practice night flights.
interesting points: The objects were sighted at an altitude of 25,000 feet and were traveling in a NW to SE direction at a very high rate of speed., The sighting lasted for approximately 4-5 seconds., The objects disappeared at about 15,000 feet altitude., Observations were consistent with known characteristics of meteors., No photographs or physical evidence were available.
